Uses of Interface
org.springframework.jms.support.JmsHeaderMapper

  • Packages that use JmsHeaderMapper 
    Package Description
    org.springframework.jms.listener.adapter
    Message listener adapter mechanism that delegates to target listener methods, converting messages to appropriate message content types (such as String or byte array) that get passed into listener methods.
    org.springframework.jms.support
    This package provides generic JMS support classes, to be used by higher-level classes like JmsTemplate.
    org.springframework.jms.support.converter
    Provides a MessageConverter abstraction to convert between Java objects and JMS messages.

    • Uses of JmsHeaderMapper in org.springframework.jms.listener.adapter

      Methods in org.springframework.jms.listener.adapter with parameters of type JmsHeaderMapper 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void AbstractAdaptableMessageListener.setHeaderMapper(JmsHeaderMapper headerMapper)
      Set the JmsHeaderMapper implementation to use to map the standard JMS headers.

    • Uses of JmsHeaderMapper in org.springframework.jms.support

      Classes in org.springframework.jms.support that implement JmsHeaderMapper 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SimpleJmsHeaderMapper
      Simple implementation of JmsHeaderMapper.

    • Uses of JmsHeaderMapper in org.springframework.jms.support.converter

      Methods in org.springframework.jms.support.converter with parameters of type JmsHeaderMapper 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void MessagingMessageConverter.setHeaderMapper(JmsHeaderMapper headerMapper)
      Set the JmsHeaderMapper to use to map JMS headers to and from standard message headers.
      Constructors in org.springframework.jms.support.converter with parameters of type JmsHeaderMapper 
      Constructor and Description
      MessagingMessageConverter(MessageConverter payloadConverter, JmsHeaderMapper headerMapper)
      Create an instance with the specified payload converter and header mapper.
